self.title: CDISC Questionnaire SGRQ Past 3 Months Version Test Name Terminology

definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version test name.
name: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version Questionnaire Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire SGRQ Past 3 Months Version Test Name Terminology
synonyms: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: I get afraid or panic when I cannot catch my breath.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Get Afraid When Cannot Catch My Breath

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot go out for entertainment or recreation.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Cannot Go Out for Entertainment

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot go out of the house to do the shopping.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Cannot Go Out to Do Shopping
terms.submissionValue: SGRQ01-Cannot Go Out to Do Shopping
synonyms: SGRQ01-Cannot Go Out to Do Shopping

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: My cough or breathing is embarrassing in public.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - My Cough is Embarrassing in Public

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are more questions about your cough and shortness of breath these days: My coughing or breathing disturbs my sleep.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Coughing Disturbs My Sleep

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are more questions about your cough and shortness of breath these days: Coughing hurts.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Coughing Hurts

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are more questions about your cough and shortness of breath these days: Coughing makes me tired.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Coughing Makes Me Tired

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - Please check one box to show how you describe your current health.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Describe Your Current Health

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - How would you describe your respiratory condition?
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Describe Your Respiratory Condition

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: My breathing makes it difficult to do things such as carry heavy loads, dig in the garden or shovel snow, jog or walk briskly (5 miles per hour), play tennis or swim.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Breathing Makes Difficult to Carry Heavy Loads

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: My breathing makes it difficult to do things such as very heavy manual work, ride a bike, run, swim fast, or play competitive sports.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Breathing Makes Difficult to Do Heavy Manual Work
terms.submissionValue: SGRQ01-Difficult to Do Very Heavy Work
synonyms: SGRQ01-Difficult to Do Very Heavy Work

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: My breathing makes it difficult to do things such as walk up hills, carry things up stairs, light gardening such as weeding, dance, bowl or play golf.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Breathing Makes Difficult to Walk Up Hills

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about your respiratory treatment: I get embarrassed using my medication in public.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Embarrassed Using Medication in Public

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: Everything seems too much of an effort.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Everything Too Much Effort

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: Exercise is not safe for me.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Exercise Is Not Safe for Me
terms.submissionValue: SGRQ01-Exercise Is Not Safe for Me
synonyms: SGRQ01-Exercise Is Not Safe for Me

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - How long did the worst respiratory attack last?
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - How Long Did Worst Respiratory Attack Last
terms.submissionValue: SGRQ01-How Long Worst Resp Attack Last
synonyms: SGRQ01-How Long Worst Resp Attack Last

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - Over the past 3 months, in a typical week, how many good days (with few respiratory problems) have you had?
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - How Many Good Days You Had
terms.submissionValue: SGRQ01-How Many Good Days Have You Had
synonyms: SGRQ01-How Many Good Days Have You Had

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - Best describe how your respiratory problems affect you.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - How Respiratory Problems Affect You

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot do household chores.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Cannot Do Household Chores

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot move far from my bed or chair.

terms.submissionValue: SGRQ01-I Cannot Move Far From My Bed
synonyms: SGRQ01-I Cannot Move Far From My Bed

terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Cannot Play Sports or Do Physical Activities

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: I cannot take a bath or shower, or I take a long time to do it.

terms.submissionValue: SGRQ01-I Cannot Take a Bath or Shower

terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - I Get Exhausted Easily

terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Become Frail or Invalid Because of My Respiratory Problems

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - Over the past 3 months, I have brought up phlegm (sputum).
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - I Have Brought Up Phlegm

terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - I Have Coughed

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - Over the past 3 months, I have had shortness of breath.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - I Have Had Shortness of Breath
terms.submissionValue: SGRQ01-I Have Had Shortness of Breath
synonyms: SGRQ01-I Have Had Shortness of Breath

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - Over the past 3 months, I have had wheezing attacks.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - I Have Had Wheezing Attacks

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: I walk slower than other people my age, or I stop to rest.

terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Jobs Take Long Time or I Have to Stop

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: I do not expect my respiratory problems to get any better.

terms.submissionValue: SGRQ01-Not in Control of Resp Problems
synonyms: SGRQ01-Not in Control of Resp Problems

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about what activities usually make you feel short of breath these days: Playing sports or other physical activities.

terms.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: My respiratory problems are a nuisance to my family, friends or neighbors.
terms.preferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Respiratory Problems a Nuisance to Family
